title: C Level 3 — Conditions and Logic
concept: Use if/else conditions to solve logic puzzles like equality checks and chess piece movements.

challenges.title: How Many are Equal?
challenges.description: Given three integers, print 3 if all of them are equal, 2 if exactly two of them are equal, or 0 if all numbers are different.

challenges.title: Rook Move
challenges.description: Given coordinates of two different squares on a chessboard, determine whether a rook can move from the first to the second in one move.
challenges.inputDescription: Four integers x1, y1, x2, y2 (1 to 8).
challenges.outputDescription: YES if rook can move in one move, otherwise NO.

challenges.title: Same Color Cells
challenges.description: Given two squares of a chessboard, determine if they have the same color.
challenges.inputDescription: Four integers x1, y1, x2, y2 (1 to 8).
challenges.outputDescription: YES if same color, otherwise NO.

challenges.title: King Move
challenges.description: Given two different chessboard cells, determine whether a king can move from the first to the second in one move.
challenges.inputDescription: Four integers x1, y1, x2, y2.
challenges.outputDescription: YES if king can move in one move, otherwise NO.

challenges.title: Bishop Move
challenges.description: Given two chessboard cells, determine whether a bishop can move from the first to the second in one move.
challenges.inputDescription: Four integers x1, y1, x2, y2.
challenges.outputDescription: YES if bishop can move in one move, otherwise NO.

challenges.title: Queen Move
challenges.description: Given two chessboard cells, determine whether a queen can move from the first to the second in one move.
challenges.inputDescription: Four integers x1, y1, x2, y2.
challenges.outputDescription: YES if queen can move in one move, otherwise NO.

challenges.title: Knight Move
challenges.description: Given two chessboard cells, determine whether a knight can move from the first to the second in one move.
challenges.inputDescription: Four integers x1, y1, x2, y2.
challenges.outputDescription: YES if knight can move in one move, otherwise NO.

challenges.title: Chocolate Bar Split
challenges.description: A chocolate bar is n × m pieces. Determine if it can be split into two rectangles so that one part has exactly k pieces.
challenges.outputDescription: YES if such a split is possible, otherwise NO.

challenges.title: Leap Year
challenges.description: Given a year number, print LEAP if it's a leap year according to Gregorian rules, otherwise print COMMON.

challenges.title: Min and Max Check (Extra Condition Practice)
challenges.description: Given three integers, print the smallest and the largest, separated by a space.
